attributes-to-log-regex.name: attributes-to-log-regex

properties.distinctQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
finess, taux_reco_brut AS taux
FROM FLOWFILE

properties.Replacement Value:
INSERT INTO TABLE FAIT_SATISFACTION (id_etabliseement, taux_satisfaction)
VALUES ('${finess}', '${taux}');

properties.validation-details-attribute-name:
/Numero_acte_deces IS NOT NULL
  AND /Age IS NOT NULL
  AND /Mois_deces IS NOT NULL AND /Code_lieu_deces IS NOT NULL
  AND /Anne_deces IS NOT NULL;

labels.label: Entrepôt de données (processus pour récupérer les données JSON et les envoyer en requête SQL)
